Articles.Content: This may sound silly, but I caught myself googling about how to fix that the lead on a mechanical pen slips out, and I actually spent 20 minutes trying to fix this VERY first-world issue. Am I so cheap that I am beyond rescue? If no, do you have any suggestions for the pens?
You're doing what any reasonable person would do. Try to fix it/delay as long as possible until buying a new one. Kep trying and you might just become a handyman
